developer_comments.en-US:
To understand prefectly how you can use this plugin (addon), please have a look to this pages :
  • http://peachphone.com
  • http://peachphone.com/release/
  • http://peachphone.com/what/
  • http://peachphone.com/where/

name.it: Peachphone il vostro webcam inviato in MMS
name.nl: Peachphone uw webcam die in MMS wordt verzonden
name.de: Peachphone Ihr in MMS gesendetes Webcam
name.pt-BR: Peachphone a vossa câmara enviada em MMS

caption.en-US:
Send SMS, MMS, make phone calls, manage mobile website, contacts and communicat with your mobile phone with Peachphone.
A lot of options are avaibles such as :

    * Video from your Webcam
    * Video from Youtube
    * Send photos
    * Upload your contacts from : Thunderbird, Outlook, MSN, Yahoo, Facebook, and may mores...
    * Export your contacts to vCard
    * SMS Mass mailing to many contacts at the same time
    * Receive your emails by SMS (without any subscription)
    * Receive Meteo by SMS
    * Receive Google Maps by SMS
    * Receive Stocks informations by SMS
    * Send the mouse-selected-text
    * Synchronize data with your Android phone
    * Generate QRCode of Images,Videos,text,contacts,event...
    * and many more options !...

Firefox-iPhone like plugin, very easy to use.
It allow you to send rich SMS/MMS to all your contacts, with best prices.
Peachphone widget is an "iPhone-like" widget with many sub-applications inside. (maps, meteo, stocks, webcam recorder, cooliris browser, email-sms, contact manager, and many more ....)

You can record your own video from your webcam, the recorded video is stored online and is automaticaly sent to your mobile contact (a copy is sent by email to be sure your contact will see the video).
You can send SMS/MMS to one or many (thousand...) mobile contacts, with uploaded videos, or webcam recorded videos with a message linked.

You can send by MMS a Gmap of any worldwide destination. The MMS received is an URL of the selected location.
The GMap mini application is with the sames features then the Android or iPhone one.

You can check and receive meteo previsions, you can look for any destination worldwild, you can define periodical sms to receive meteo on your mobile if you are in hollidays for instance ( every day, every week, every month). Previsions are both in degrees celsius or fahrenheit with a little shape of the climat.

You can create your own mobile website and manage it.
You can add images, videos, text, sound or a map.
You can communicate with your friends like by SMS, but it's totaly free !
You can buy and assign a .mobi name to have a mobile website with your name (like "johnkerry.mobi", better than a phone number, no !?).
You can add you .mobi website to your mobile phone dashboard to use it as an application (you can also manage the application icon) !
Peachphone widget contain a payment solution to quickly update your account credits, to : Send SMS world wide, buy .mobi website, make phone calls.

you can manage ALL YOUR CONTACTS (from yahoo,facebook, gmail, outlook, thunderbird, aol, mobileMe, caramail, msn, ...) in an iPhone like contact manager.
You can select one or many contcat to send them SMS or MMS

You can search for contact by first name, last name, email, mobile phone.

You can export on contact or all your contacts into vCard

You can share and communicates (images,videos,contacts,event,map,calendar, or any url) with a Barcode application that Generate QRcodes.
You can also send automaticaly datas to Android if you have downloaded the application in your Google account.

You can catch ALL YOUR CONTACTS and manage them throught only one Widget. Then you can also export all your contacts into vCard format
Your contacts are centralized into the only computer widget that realy manage and store your contacts (Gmail,Yahoo,MSN,Hotmail,MobileMe,Outlook,Thunderbird...).
You can buy or manage domain names to create your own .mobi website

We are working on it...
Soonly you will be able to make calls with peachphone virtual mobile phone or synchronise your Google voice account to receive or make calls.
You can directly download other widget for other OS (Mac or PC), other Browser (Firefox or IE, even if it's much more developed for Firefox), or use the online widgets (Facebook, iGoogle)
The widget is paste into your browser (at the to right), and you can select a text and rigth-click to send it !
multi-language (English, French, Italian, Spanish, German, Polish, Rusian, Japones, Chines, Norvegian, Hungarian, Serbian, Catalan)

After selecting an image (from your album inside the widget or an uploaded image) you can edit it.

it's an a real photoshop like option :

- You can change the hue, brightness, contrast and saturation.
- You can crop you images (to mobile phone screen size)
- You can save and export the result (localy in your album folder in the widget or directly in your own computer).
-You can send the image result to any mobile phone by MMS (or WAP push)
You can browse your images or videos inside your album folders with an iPhone-like image slider.

With Cooliris search engine, you can search 
videos on Youtube, images on Google, yahoo, Facebook, picasa or Flickr
You can send the selected image or video by MMS or WAP push.
You can also edit the selected images with a photoshop-like small editor.
From your Widget Dashboard you can select and play a game (soonly more)
Record a sound, save it in your album library (within the widget) and/or send it by MMS or to your .mobi website.

summary.ko: SMS 및 MMS는 중, MMS를, YouTube에서 동영상, 사진 전송, (썬더버드, 아웃룩, MSN, 야후) 연락처 관리 웹캠 동영상을 전송, 많은 연락처 (날씨,지도)을 일괄적으로 메일을 보내는 중. http://peachphone.com에서 테스트
